participant_1.name: Ethan Carter
participant_1.personality: Confident and ambitious, Ethan is driven by his desire to succeed in the world of finance. He is also somewhat competitive.
participant_1.background: my parents are very wealthy bankers. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. i drive a bmw. i plan to go to business school next year.

participant_2.name: Jamie Smith
participant_2.personality: Fun-loving and quirky, Jamie enjoys the simple pleasures in life and often embraces their unique interests with enthusiasm.
participant_2.background: i drive a ford pinto. i like donuts. my favorite band is the insane clown posse. on weekends i do live action roleplaying events. i play a lot of call of duty.

content.text: That is great. i want to be an accountant
